justification: “The Toronto Empathy answers were summed to derive totals according to the Toronto Empathy Questionnaire protocol.”
“The Melbourne Decision Making answers were split into four groups: buck-passing, hyper-vigilance, vigilance, and procrastination … according to the Melbourne Decision Making Questionnaire.”
“General Self-Efficacy scores were summed to derive a total.”
“The NEO Five-Factor Inventory scores were summed in each domain … and converted into t-scores.”

measured_by: Inventory of Creative Activities and Achievements
justification: “The Creative Achievements and Activities answers were split into Creative Activities and Creative Achievements…”
“The Alternative Uses Task was scored … along two dimensions of fluency and originality.”
“NIH Toolbox instruments were used to collect the Emotion-Battery, and survey scores were calculated with the NIH Toolbox manual.”
“The groups were defined based on the participant's responses to the Entrepreneur Manager Quotient, which established their experience in both entrepreneurship and management.”
